DOC.brief_summary: Healthy volunteer age 21 50 need research study investigate whether pain alter binding property ( [ 11C ] diprenorphine ) , molecule use brain imaging . Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) functional Magnetic Resonance ( fMRI ) imaging use study .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Pressure Pain 11CDiprenorphine Binding Potentials
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female adult , 21 50 year age No contraindication fMRI PET scan Within 15 % ideal body mass index ( BMI ) Current significant medical , neurological , psychiatric illness assess Physician Investigators Women pregnant breast feeding , go menopause , and/or irregular menstrual cycle Claustrophobia History head trauma Instability responses experimental pain ( See Study Procedure Section Part II ) History asthma Use psychotropic drug hormone treatment ( include hormonal birth control ) within one year date consent History smoking Routine exercise excess one hour per day and/or three time per week Nonfluent English speaker
